title: My Younger Brother Is Salivating After Me - Novel Updates
tags: Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   R-18   Strong Love Interests   Younger Love Interests
author: Lee Jiwoo   이지우
description:
The general from the Jangmoon family returned from the war under the orders of the Emperor.

However, while he was away, his grandmother took over his mansion and secretly proceeded with his marriage to Yasmine.

“Today we are going to have the first night of the marriage. The place where my sister should be is by my side.”

Yasmine was upset when he came to her just seven days before marriage.

She gets confused by his words that he will spend the first night with her…>
